attributes.title: Imma go bleach my soul 😢🖐
attributes.review: This is the trashiest app that I have ever encountered through my entire time living as a human being on planet earth. I could not even find a trashier app this. Even tinder comes within second place. I’m disgusted from the app, and I will refused to keep on living if I see this app ever again. Terrible title, I could not understand why the app’s name is (Donald Trump... Cough cough) “Trash”. And did I also mention this app stinks? Even number 15 Burger King foot lettuce gives a nice reputation to itself compared to this, absolute, outrageously, mortifying, and disgusting app. I feel physically, mentally, and spiritually ABUSED upon looking at the app! Imma just gonna go 🌈🤚🌈🖐🙅🏻‍♂️after this 😭😭😭😭😭😭. Anyways, this is an Apple user, and I approve of this message.

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: Ok I’m a trump supporter I am 45 years old and I love trump to death BUTTTTT this app took dayssss to download to be more specific the app took a FULL two weeks to download and that is unexpectedly. ALSO the app is very very veryyyyy laggy it was laggy that I had to ask my KIDSSS to fix it for me and even then could NOT fix also I when I download the app it put a VIRUS on my phone AND this is a BRAND NEW phone it is a iPhone 11 Pro Max and WHEN I went to Apple they couldn’t even FIX IT. That shows that this app is very very very veryyy BAD and needs to be taken off the App Store and for that IM NO LONGER A TRUMP SUPPORTER  that piece of do do the orange 🍊 man SHOULD not run for president Bc that is how bad he is and this app needs to be taken off of the Apple store PERIOD

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD😡✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review:
This app is the absolute WORST. I will not be downloading any app like this EVER again. So first when i open this app, it was sooo glitchy and the adds were unnecessary! and after that apparently after downloading it gave me a huge virus and broke my phone. my keyboard didn't work, my screen went green at some points, and i couldn't even use my camera. do not download this app! i had to replace my phone. Even after i downloaded a vpn it did nothing to the virus. i have read many other reviews and it all is the same things that happened to me. and lastly, back to the adds. after i opened the app the inappropriate (sexual) adds in front of my kids, they started to cry. WORST APP EVER. 😡😡😡

- gen z

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took me so many hours to open it because it kept logging out and glitching. I have perfect WiFi btw! When I finally got it open, there was just an ugly picture of an orange Oompa Loompa on my screen when I thought I had downloaded the official trump 2020 app. This is the most awful app I have ever used and I would not recommend downloading it at all! The app literally doesn’t do what I tell it to do and is literally ignoring the users of the app. I REPEAT this app is NOT user friendly and if u download it, it will break your phone and yell racist, homophobic slangs at u. I’m sure the maker had great intentions with this app, but the people of the United States VOTES NO!!! #DELETETHISAPP2020

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app last night and it made me fall asleep within seconds of looking at it, I think it might have drugged me 😔. This morning when I opened my phone I had calendar viruses and could not get rid of them and it would send “trump 2020” and pictures of oranges every 3 minutes. When I finally god rid of them my phone turned into a picture with an orange 🍊on it I got so scared that I threw my phone across the room so after I had to get my phone fixed. They guy at the store told me that I would have to get a new phone because all my photos my downloads my google searches are all replaced with oranges and that would be no point into keeping it. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU VALUE YOUR LIFE !!!!

attributes.title: if i could i would rate 0 stars
attributes.review: this app took MONTHS to download. when i finally was able to open it it kept on crashing and opening my music app? it would always bring me to an album called fine line by harry styles? and when i would go back to the trump app it would blast the song ‘she’ at full volume until it was over. VERY ANNOYING!!!! after a month or so it stopped doing it but then it started playing 100 gecs!!! it made my ears bleed so many times i had to go to hospital. i tried emailing the creators of this app to pay for my hospital bills and the refused!!!! instead they sent police officers to my house and ordered them to shoot my dog and cat!! extremely unprofessional app 😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🖕🏻🖕🏻

attributes.title: WORST APP IN AMERICA!
attributes.review: I CANNOT BELIEVE THIS APP! tuh AS IF! as the queen once said ✨ i cannot believe that i didn’t believe people almost died while having this app! tots not cool! i just had a literal earthquake in my house because of this disgusting app! like how you make my house move like a snake? i am really at a loss for words... i cannot believe my house just got trampled. there was a herd of geese running all through my house yelling “trump 2020 🇺🇸” and i was TERRIFIED!!! HOW DARE YOU ASSAULT MY HOME! my home was built in 1770 and your app just decided it was going to break it down?! not on my watch! i tried to refresh to see if everything would go back to normal but a hologram of DR TRUMP showed up on my phone telling me to “vote kanye 2020 haha sike” >:( SO ANGRY 😤 1 STAR DUDE IF I COULD GIVE U NO STARS I WOULD

attributes.title: THIS APP ALMOST KILLED ME???((not clickbait))
attributes.review: so i had downloaded this app because yasss love trump. what i experienced when i had it downloaded was unlike any worldly experience i’ve ever had. the app would open up and at night and project a hologram of trump taking off his makeup and wig. and then he would try to whisper me lullabies. so i started putting my phone in the freezer at night in hopes to kill whatever was contacting me via this terrible app. but i fear that only made it angrier, he then would proceed to rub hot cheeto dust all throughout my house and in my animals coats. and the final straw was when he tried to suffocate me with his toupee. I am so traumatized, this app is haunted!!!!! delete it from your devices!!! who knows how long the spirits can linger.

attributes.title: The Boomers tried to get me!!!!
attributes.review: I decided to download the app to finally understand the ways of the boomer and why they  are always so angry😌. But when opening the app I was bombarded by many boomers consisting of old white men that love to moan and groan about problems that don’t concern them😠 ✨anyways✨ many of them found my number and tried to BRAINWASH me to believing their boomer ways😟 but I thank Manny for giving me the strength to not conform and to always remember to mind my business 🙌🏻 after that I was so scared for my life that I soon deleted the app and it was as if the 🧚🏻‍♂️ were on my side and casted all the boomers out of my messages. This app will bring hateful boomers and FAKE news into your life😡. All in all this app is NOT worth the bad vibes

attributes.title: Disappointed, but not surprised 😤😤
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and was SHOCKED at how slow it runs! It took absolutely forever to download, to the extent where I wondered if there was something wrong with my phone! Then when I finally opened it asked for my phone number???? I wanted to use my email but it wouldn’t let me!!!! Donald J Trump apparently couldn’t pay enough to make sure his supporters can get contacted in as many ways as possible! I finally gave in and put in my mobile number (I don’t want to gov to know that! 😤😤😤😤) and I got so many glitches! I had to take it off my device bc I thought it might’ve gotten hacked! Do NOT get this app. Mr President you need to Completely change this app and take it down
